title: sa_bṛhaspatismṛti-vyavahārakāṇḍa
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
      <div>
	<head>śrī brhaspatismṛtiḥ</head>

	<div type='kāṇḍa' n='1' xml:id='BrhS_1'>
	  <head>vyavahāra<orig>-</orig>kāṇḍam</head>

	  <pb edRef='#Aiyangar1941' n='1'/>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.1'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmapradhānāḥ puruṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam āsann ahiṃsakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lobhadveṣābhibhūtānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāraḥ pravartitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.1'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharma-pradhānāḥ puruṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam āsann ahiṃsakāḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lobha-dveṣa-abhibhūtānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāraḥ pravartitaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.2'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayacchec ced bhṛtiṃ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyānāṃ karma kurvatām</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kurvanti ca bhṛtyāś cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra vādaḥ pravartate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.2'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayacchec ced bhṛtiṃ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyānāṃ karma kurvatām</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kurvanti ca bhṛtyāś cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra vādaḥ pravartate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.3'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hiṃsāṃ vā kurute kaś cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deyaṃ vā na prayacchati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dve hi sthāne vivādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayor bahutarā gatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.3'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hiṃsāṃ vā kurute kaś cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deyaṃ vā na prayacchati</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dve hi sthāne vivādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayor bahutarā gatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.4'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yato dravyaṃ vinikrīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṇārthaṃ caiva gṛhyate</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanmūlyam uttamarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāra iti smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.4'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yato dravyaṃ vinikrīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṇa-arthaṃ ca eva gṛhyate</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan-mūlyam uttama-rṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāra iti smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <note type='subheading'>rāja-guṇāḥ</note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.5'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇadharmān ato rājñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanikarṇikasaṃdigdhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibhūlekhyasākṣiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.5'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇa-dharmān ato rājñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanikarṇika-saṃdigdhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibhū-lekhya-sākṣiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.6'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicārayati yaḥ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyotpattiṃ nibodhata</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>somāgnyarkānilendrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vittāpattyor yamasya ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.6'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicārayati yaḥ samyak</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya utpattiṃ nibodhata</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>soma-agny-arka-anila-indrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta-apattyor yamasya ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.7'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tejomātraṃ samuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājño mūrtir hi nirmitā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya savāṇi bhūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carāṇi sthāvarāṇi ca</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.7'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tejo-mātraṃ samuddhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājño mūrtir hi nirmitā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya savāṇi bhūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carāṇi sthāvarāṇi ca</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.8'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhayād bhogāya kalpante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadharmān na calanti ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārājake kṛṣivaṇik</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kusīdaparipālanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.8'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhayād bhogāya kalpante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadharmān na calanti ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na arājake kṛṣi-vaṇik</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kusīda-paripālanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.9'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād varṇāśramāṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netāsau nirmitaḥ purā</seg> /</l>
	    <note type='subheading'>vyavahārapadāni</note>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvipado vyavahāraḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanahiṃsāsamudbhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.9'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād varṇa-āśramāṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>neta āsau nirmitaḥ purā</seg> /</l>
	      <note type='subheading'>vyavahāra-padāni</note>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvi-pado vyavahāraḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhana-hiṃsā-samudbhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.10'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvisaptako'rthamūlas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hiṃsāmūlaś caturvidhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāruṣye dve vadhaś caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parastrīsaṃgrahas tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.10'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvisaptako-'rtha-mūlas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hiṃsā-mūlaś caturvidhaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāruṣye dve vadhaś ca eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>para-strī-saṃgrahas tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.11'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kusīdanidhideyād yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhūyotthānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyadānam aśuśrūṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūvādo 'svāmivikriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.11'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kusīda-nidhideyād yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhūya utthānam eva ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtya-dānam aśuśrūṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūvādo 'svāmi-vikriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.12'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krayavikrayānuśayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samayātikramas tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīpuṃsayogaḥ steyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāyabhāgo'kṣadevanam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.12'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kraya-vikraya-anuśayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samaya-atikramas tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strī-puṃsa-yogaḥ steyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāya-bhāgo-'kṣa-devanam</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.13'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāny arthasamutthāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padāni tu caturdaśa</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar evaṃ prabhinnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyābhedād anekadahā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.13'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāny artha-samutthāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padāni tu caturdaśa</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar evaṃ prabhinnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyā-bhedād anekadahā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.14'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāruṣye dve sāhasaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parastrīsaṃgrahas tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṃsodbhavapadāny evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catvāry āha bṛhaspatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.14'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāruṣye dve sāhasaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-strī-saṃgrahas tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṃsā-udbhava-padāny evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catvāry āha bṛhaspatiḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.15'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hīnamadhyottamatvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśeṣa eṣāṃ nirdiṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturṇām apy anukramāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.15'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hīna-madhya-uttamatvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśeṣa eṣāṃ nirdiṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturṇām apy anukramāt</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.16'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padāny aṣṭādaśaitāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmaśāstroditāni tu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūlaṃ sarvavivādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ye vidus te parīkṣakāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.16'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padāny aṣṭādaśa etāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharma-śāstra-uditāni tu</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūlaṃ sarva-vivādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ye vidus te parīkṣakāḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.17'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvapakṣaḥ smṛtaḥ pādo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyas tūttaras tathā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāpādas tathā vācyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturtho nirṇayas tathā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.17'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrva-pakṣaḥ smṛtaḥ pādo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyas tu uttaras tathā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyā-pādas tathā vācyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturtho nirṇayas tathā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>

	  <note type='subheading'>dharmādi-catuṣṭaya-balābalam</note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.18'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāritreṇa nṛpājñayā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catuṣprakāro'bhihitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdigdhe 'rthe vinirṇayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.18'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāritreṇa nṛpa-ājñayā</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catuṣ-prakāro-'bhihitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdigdhe 'rthe vinirṇayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.19'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāstraṃ kevalam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyate yatra nirṇayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavahāraḥ sa vijñeyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmas tenāpi vardhate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.19'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāstraṃ kevalam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyate yatra nirṇayaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavahāraḥ sa vijñeyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmas tena api vardhate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.20'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśasthityānumānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naigamānumatena ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyate nirṇayas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāras tu bādhyate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.20'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśa-sthitya ānumānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naigama-anumatena ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyate nirṇayas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāras tu bādhyate</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.21'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihāya caritācāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra kuryāt punar nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirṇayaṃ sā tu rājājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ bādhyate tayā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.21'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihāya carita-ācāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra kuryāt punar nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirṇayaṃ sā tu rājā ājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ bādhyate tayā</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.22'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaśāstrānusāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāmātyaḥ sa purohitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavahārān nṛpaḥ paśyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajāsaṃrakṣaṇāya ca</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>krodhalobhavihīnas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>satyavādī jitendriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.22'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharma-śāstra-anusāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-amātyaḥ sa purohitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavahārān nṛpaḥ paśyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajā-saṃrakṣaṇāya ca</seg> /</l>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>krodha-lobha-vihīnas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>satyavādī jita-indriyaḥ</seg> //</l>
	    </lg>
	  </note>

	  <note type='subheading'>dharmādhikaraṇam</note>
	  <lg xml:id='BrhS_1.1.23'>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saptaprakṛtikaṃ yat tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijigīṣor areś ca yat</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturdaśakam evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍalaṃ paricakṣate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	  <note type='analysis' corresp='#BrhS_1.1.23'>
	    <lg>
	      <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sapta-prakṛtikaṃ yat tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijigīṣor areś ca yat</seg> /</l>
